title: 1907 H.M Taylor Detroit Tigers Team Postcard w/ Cobb for Sale/Trade
author: shammus

posts.post_title: 1907 H.M Taylor Detroit Tigers Team Postcard w/ Cobb for Sale/Trade
posts.post_content:
Downgraded to a "1" for obvious writing on the front and back but still a great shot of Cobb in his early years.  No wear or damage exists on the photo except for a couple wrinkles in the corners.

Asking $895 delivered or happy to put towards a Ruth / Wagner card in trade.  Thanks in advance!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Thank you Jeff, hope all is well with you!
Pretty brian hope you r well
